DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study daily monitor discoloration teeth participant rinse mouth rinse black tea determine time point unacceptable discoloration occurs .
DOC.brief_title: Determination Threshold Mouth Rinse Induced Discoloration Teeth
DOC.detailed_description: Tooth discoloration side effect mouth rinse solution . It impair aesthetic appearance especially front teeth . The aim pilot study determine time point visible discoloration appear front teeth . Therefore , participant study rinse twice daily chlorhexidine mouth rinse 10 day . To elicit pronounced discoloration , participant rinse black tea right chlorhexidine rinse . Discoloration measure daily discoloration index , spectrophotometry , use digital photo .
